Title: Persian (Jalali-Shamsi) Calendar for Windows 8
Description:
This project is a Persian calendar for Metro UI on windows 8.
It is a sample of using live tile on Metro UI.
HomeWiki:
Persian (Shamsi) Calendar

This project developed byVS2012 for Metro UI.
It is a sample for using live tags in windows 8.

Persian calendars

The Iranian (shamsi) calendars or sometimes called Persian calendars (Persian: گاهشماری ایرانی‎ Gāhšomāri-ye Irāni) are a succession of calendars invented or used for over two millennia in Greater Iran.
(source: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Iranian_calendars)
